page.title: 02A DAY IN THE LIFE OF HAZEL
page.content: I get up at 7 o'clock in the morning and get dressed,then go down and have Sugar Puffs.Then I brush my teeth and go to school.We play for a bit and then go in.In school we do writing and maths in the morning.We have dinner at quarter past twelve and after we have play_time.I play with Megan and Penny.When we come in we do more work.When we come home I put other clothes on and play with Megan.We play in my bedroom.We sometimes play outside on rollerskates.It is good, sometimes we fall down.When Megan goes home I have my supper,I have some cheese and a bun.I watch telly.I play a little bit.I sometimes read a book called "Far and Wide",it is good.I go upstairs,brush my teeth,get undressed and get into bed.I say my times tables and my spellings then go to sleep.
